data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人等丈夫上班走后，把孩子送去上学，然后来到楼上自己的卧室。
data.Sentence: After her husband had gone to work, Mrs. Richards sent her children to school and went upstairs to her bedroom.

data.Sentence_cn: 那天上午，她兴奋得什么家务活都不想做，因为晚上她要同丈夫一起参加一个化装舞会。
data.Sentence: She was too excited to do any housework that morning, for in the evening she would be going to a fancy-dress party with her husband.

data.Sentence_cn: 她打算装扮成鬼的模样。头天晚上她已把化装服做好，这时她急于想试试。
data.Sentence: She intended to dress up as a ghost and as she had made her costume the night before, she was impatient to try it on.

data.Sentence_cn: 尽管化装服仅由一个被单制成，却十分逼真。
data.Sentence: Though the costume consisted only of a sheet, it was very effective.

data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人穿上化装服后下了楼，
data.Sentence: After putting it on, Mrs. Richards went downstairs.
She wanted to find out whether it would be comfortable to wear.

data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人刚刚走进餐厅，前门就传来敲门声。
data.Sentence: Just as Mrs. Richards was entering the dining room, there was a knock on the front door.

data.Sentence_cn: 她知道来人一定是面包师。
data.Sentence: She knew that it must be the baker.

data.Sentence_cn: 她曾告诉过面包师，如果她不去开门，他可直接进门，把面包放在厨房的桌上。
data.Sentence: She had told him to come straight in if ever she failed to open the door and to leave the bread on the kitchen table.

data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人不想吓唬这个可怜人，便赶紧躲到了楼梯下的小储藏室里。
data.Sentence: Not wanting to frighten the poor man, Mrs. Richards quickly hid in the small storeroom under the stairs.

data.Sentence_cn: 她听见前门被打开，走廊里响起了重重的脚步声。
data.Sentence: She heard the front door open and heavy footsteps in the hall.

data.Sentence_cn: 突然贮藏室门开了，一个男人走了进来。
data.Sentence: Suddenly the door of the storeroom was opened and a man entered.

data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人这才想到一定是供电局来人查电表了。
data.Sentence: Mrs. Richards realized that it must be the man from the Electricity Board who had come to read the metre.

data.Sentence_cn: 她说了声“是我，别怕！”然后想进行一番解释，但已来不及了。
data.Sentence: She tried to explain the situation, saying 'It's only me', but it was too late.

data.Sentence_cn: 那人大叫了一声，惊退了几步。
data.Sentence: The man let out a cry and jumped back several paces.

data.Sentence_cn: 理查兹夫人朝他走去，只见他“砰”的一声关上门逃走了。
data.Sentence: When Mrs. Richards walked towards him, he fled, slamming the door behind him.
